title: IDE Libraries
synopsis: These script only stacks where the bulk of the interfaces are to be found for the [[Livecode IDE]].

title: ideDocsFetchLCSData
synopsis: Fetch the data for LiveCode script dictionary entries with name <pEntryName>

title: ideDocsFetchLCSDataOfType
synopsis: Fetch the data for the LiveCode script dictionary entry with name <pEntryName>

title: ideDocsFetchLCSElementOfType
synopsis: Fetch a specific element of the array of data for the LiveCode script dictionary entry

title: ideDocsFetchLCSEntries
synopsis: Fetch the data for all entries in the LiveCode script dictionary

title: ideDocsFetchLibraryNames
synopsis: Returns a list of library names, one per line, which have API entries in the dictionary.

title: Livecode IDE
synopsis: Here we document the Livecode IDE and the core handlers and API we can use to extend it and interact with it.

title: revidedocumentationlibrary
synopsis: This library contains the code to interface with the the [[Livecode Dictionary]].

title: revMetadataGet
synopsis: Sets the specified metadata item for pObject to pValue

title: revmetadatalibrary
synopsis: Metadata library, this allows the setting and getting of metadata items on LiveCode objects. The metadata is divided into types, which map to the custom property sets cREVGeneral, cREVDatabase etc.

title: revMetadataSet
synopsis: Sets the specified metadata item for pObject to pValue

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site about the [[Livecode IDE]]. Here we document the [[IDE Libraries]]
